results.title: Effects of simvastatin on 5-fluorouracil-induced gastrointestinal mucositis in rats.
results.text_hl: In the stomach and jejunum, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ caused significant protective effects against @CHEMICAL_Fluorouracil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005472 @@@5-FU@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Mucositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052016 @@@mucosal injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Medeiros ADC, Azevedo ÍM, Lima ML, Araújo Filho I, Moreira MD. Effects of simvastatin on 5-fluorouracil-induced gastrointestinal mucositis in rats. Rev Col Bras Cir. 2018 Oct 18;45(5):e1968. PMID: 30379218
citations.BibTeX: @article{30379218, title={Effects of simvastatin on 5-fluorouracil-induced gastrointestinal mucositis in rats.}, author={Medeiros ADC and Azevedo ÍM and Lima ML and Araújo Filho I and Moreira MD}, journal={Rev Col Bras Cir}, volume={45}, number={5}, pages={e1968}}

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on intestinal recovery following gut ischemia-reperfusion injury in a rat.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ prevents @<m>DISEASE_Mucositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052016 @@@gut mucosal damage@@@ and inhibits programmed cell death following intestinal @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@IR@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@.

citations.NLM: Slijper N, Sukhotnik I, Chemodanov E, Bashenko Y, Shaoul R, Coran AG, Mogilner J. Effect of simvastatin on intestinal recovery following gut ischemia-reperfusion injury in a rat. Pediatr Surg Int. 2010 Jan;26(1):105-10. PMID: 19855982
